Name: Switch Azure Staging Deployment Slot
Description:
This template will warm up your deployment slot then swap it with production. This step template should be placed after ""Deploy an Azure Web App" Octopus Deploy template and be used with its sister step "Create Azure RM Deployment Slot"

This should be used for green-blue deployments, as referenced in this document: https://octopus.com/docs/deploying-applications/deploying-to-azure/deploying-a-package-to-an-azure-web-app/using-deployment-slots-with-azure-web-apps

Parameters.Name: ResourceGroupName
Parameters.Label: ResourceGroupName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name of the resource group you are deploying this Web App into

Parameters.Name: AppName
Parameters.Label: AppName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name of your app

Parameters.Name: AzureAccount
Parameters.Label: AzureAccount
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the SPN used to connect to Azure

Parameters.Name: SlotName
Parameters.Label: SlotName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name you wish to call your deployment slot

Parameters.Name: SmokeTestResponseCode
Parameters.Label: SmokeTestResponseCode(Optional)
Parameters.HelpText: This is the response code that comes back from your web app. The default value is set to 200, if your app will respond with a different status code such as a 401 then please update the value.

Parameters.Name: smokeTestTimeoutSecs
Parameters.Label: smokeTestTimeoutSecs(Optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The timeout setting for waking up your web app. The default value is 180 seconds.
